tool_description: WhoKnows uses machine learning to generate over 300M up-to-date professional profiles worldwide that can be cross-referenced with your own contacts and connections.   We offer a full API platform built on REST and GraphQL in order to enrich existing profiles and search our global network.
name: WhoKnows
title: WhoKnows

api_list.name: Enrich
api_list.description: Use the enrich API with a unique id to lookup information about a specific person including skills, work history, education, diversity, etc.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: WhoKnows profile id (usually found through search)

api_list.name: Get Contact Info
api_list.description: Use the contact method to get the contact information (emails, phone numbers, and social links) for a person found via the Search API. You must either provide the id retrieved from WhoKnows search or a combination of first_name, last_name, and company.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: WhoKnows profile id (usually found through search)

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Type of contact info to include (work, personal, phone, and/or social)
